channel.title: CVE Feed for 10web -- Slider by 10Web – Responsive Image Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 10web -- Slider by 10Web – Responsive Image Slider

item.title: CVE-2024-7150|2024-08-08T05:31:46.098Z -- 10web -- slider%20by%2010web%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20image%20slider
item.description: The Slider by 10Web – Responsive Image Slider plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to time-based SQL Injection via the 'id' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.57 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.
